scripts.satsuma:optimism-mainnet: graph deploy spot-market-optimism-mainnet subgraph.optimism-mainnet.yaml --output-dir ./build/optimism-mainnet --version-label v1 --node https://app.satsuma.xyz/api/subgraphs/deploy --deploy-key $SATSUMA_KEY --ipfs https://ipfs.satsuma.xyz
scripts.satsuma:optimism-goerli: graph deploy spot-market-optimism-goerli subgraph.optimism-goerli.yaml --output-dir ./build/optimism-goerli --version-label v1 --node https://app.satsuma.xyz/api/subgraphs/deploy --deploy-key $SATSUMA_KEY --ipfs https://ipfs.satsuma.xyz
scripts.satsuma:base-goerli-competition: graph deploy spot-market-base-testnet subgraph.base-goerli-competition.yaml --output-dir ./build/base-goerli-competition --version-label v4 --node https://app.satsuma.xyz/api/subgraphs/deploy --deploy-key $SATSUMA_KEY --ipfs https://ipfs.satsuma.xyz
scripts.coverage: yarn deployments:optimism-mainnet && yarn codegen:optimism-mainnet && git diff --exit-code && yarn test --coverage
